channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Not detecting bicycles., 21st July
item.description:
The induction loops at these traffic lights approaching from Hayden Road do not detect bicycles. Would it be possible to increase the gain on the circuit? I have to wait for a motor vehicle to pull up behind or next to me before the lights will change in my favour.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Appletree Cottage Hayden Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hole in the pavement, 21st July
item.description:
There's a hole in the pavement. Somebody has painted a white circle around it, but I'm not convinced that a walker will see a painted circle in the dark. It would be easy to turn your ankle in the hole. It needs filling in. Location is Liddington Road, between the entrance to the alleyway and the corner of the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Liddington Road, Elmbridge
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter dumped in layby, 21st July
item.description:
Reported to the council 2 weeks ago who said they couldn't see anything. So here is a fresh report & a fresh photograph.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Flight Farm Leckhampton Hill, Leckhampton Hill
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive weeds over growing alleyway. Brambles and dog poo!, 21st July
item.description:
Weeds/brambles/dog poo/litter! This walk way is a health hazard for pushchairs/wheelchairs and even able bodied pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 Kingfisher Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wedge of land between pavement and station bounrdary wall, 21st July
item.description:
Gloucester Road, opposite junction with end of Roman Road. Strip of overgrown land - keeps getting grown up, keeps getting stripped back, but otherwise neglected / disused / eyesore. New concrete foundation / base was put in during the winter (more than 6 months ago), but nothing else has happened since. Needs tidying up, and then generally looking after.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Roman Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Waste ground to rear of railway station, 21st July
item.description:
Overgrown waste ground to rear of station (bordering onto Gloucester Road) - foliage is spreading through fence across pavement, including brambles with thorns on. Needs a good cut back - ideally that patch of neglected land, which includes a long-since dead and now fallen large tree (came down more than a year ago) needs a thorough clear-out, and then something doing with it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 255-257 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very overgrown hedge, across pavement - LARGE thorns, 21st July
item.description:
Church Road, just around corner from Libertus Road (close to lamppost no., 17). Hedge on back edge of pavement is very over-grown, with large shoots across full width of pavement, many with VERY large sharp thorns on them. Needs a good trim back.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 22 Libertus Road, Saint Marks
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sinkhole Henrietta Street, Cheltenham, 20th July

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8-9 Henrietta Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Overgrown hedge, 14th July
item.description:
The hedge surrounding the bowls club is very overgrown and an force you off the footpath and into the road. This could be very dangerous, especially for a deaf or partially sighted person. The club should be required to maintain the correct width of footpath.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 23 Suffolk Square, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
